name: Hazardous Information (Xevirous)
description:
Intro

Intentionally bad game for the GBTK parody Jam.

Theme: you know what to do

Click and arrow keys and space

Story

Navigate the distracted, daydreaming mind of a student while you attempt to pay attention the your teacher and pass all of the Pop Quizzes that you encounter!

HTML5 Info

If the controls don't work try refreshing the window. Then click the run button without scrolling or clicking anything else. This is a known problem with HTML5 Itch uploads using this engine.

Credits

Game "programming"
Xevirous
Kira

Story "writing"
Joey Kalitovic

Voice "acting"
Caitlin Burt
